excerpt: "Security chiefs have long complained they can’t integrate tools from different cyber vendors because they are incompatible. Now, facing a financial crunch set off by coronavirus lockdowns, cybersecurity leaders are expected to renegotiate terms with suppliers and push them to help with integration to get the most value from tools they’ve already bought,"
